messages.message: Hi team, wanted to give a headsup. I cannot seem to use runtime configs in App Runs on AIHub Sandbox. I have an example project here (https://aihub-sandbox.internal.instabase.com/hub/apps/ec5d879d-6d9c-4256-a12b-371cdf00adc7/runs) (in the Instabase-sandbox org) but it seems that runtime configs are not being propagated on app runs but deployment runs are fine. I did test it on uat / my local crafting env and it seems to be working fine.
My understanding is this could be either an infra issue or a code change. @ayesha.ali @prateek.tenkale do you know if there were some changes to app runs / udfs recently

I'm going to rebase on master on my crafting env and see. But to help find the root cause, it was working till this PR yesterday: <vscode-file://vscode-app/Applications/Visual%20Studio%20Code.app/Contents/Resources/app/out/vs/code/electron-sandbox/workbench/workbench.html|#70267>
@Paul H are we migrating to a new endpoint with this PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/70203/files)
Based on recommendation from Anil, FE was calling an old endpoint previously
@Sayan Thank you for investigating, it probably was my change. Let me know if I can help.
A BE change needs to be made before the FE change, can we roll back the current change?
If it's urgent, I can reprioritize making the BE change but I have some other items on my plate atm
Yeah I can revert the change, letâ€™s wait for the BE change to be ready

Revert PR:
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/70333

Tested this locally and confirm the custom keys are appearing in app runs again.
